attributes.action: Allow school children to repeat this school year
attributes.additional_details: The government has closed the schools for the vast majority of the school year due to COVID-19 so it would need to be the government that passes the decision to allow all children to repeat the year.
attributes.background:
With all the upset of COVID-19, the government should allow all children to repeat the entire school year. 
Exams are cancelled so it would give all children a fair chance of entering further education.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

All pupils to repeat this current academic year.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/566160
